title: "Machine vision developed to support autonomous drones and robots"
excerpt: "European research project, led by Finnish group VTT, is “inspired by human vision system”. MISEL project aims to develop a machine vision system for UAVs and more. Autonomously moving drones and other robots must observe their environment and interpret their observations without interruption."
